column1: my parents have Direct TV and it’s raining. all i know it is, it better clear up before 9.
Time to get your vote on (I apologize) for this week’s edition of “nicole gets plastered and watches”
I’ve got a request in from my sister this week as well, so that should be interesting…
Am I watching the pilot episode of Hit the Floor? Yes. Yes, I am.
Did my dear sister recommend this show? Yes. Yes, she did.
"She took off like Toni Braxton and the IRS."
